attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent, I oppose the proposed increase as definded in USCIS 2006-
0044.

The building of families through adoption should be available to most; however,
increase in fees for adoption related services this dramatic in nature, can make it
impossible for a family to attain their goal of building a family.

The average percentage increase of almost 66%, is not justified to meet the
service needs and completion of these forms by our qualified government
employees, who graciously received a 2.2% cost of living pay increase for 2007.

Please re-examine the need to increase fees associated with adoption related
immigration forms for US citizens seeking to adopt a foreign orphan and form the
perfect American family.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Donald Minot
